css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-4fc33823-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);justify-content:center;min-width:initial;transform-origin:50% 50% ;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-4fc33823-u .maxi-image-block-wrapper{justify-content:center;}body.maxi-blocks--active #image-maxi-4fc33823-u .maxi-image-block-wrapper img{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px
